cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 35 miles W of Cancun, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking northwest across the southern Gulf, then turning north toward the central-northern Gulf Coast (likely Louisiana).
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: south-central Louisiana coast (near Cameron-Morgan City area)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Greatest impacts expected from the TX-LA border eastward to the MS coast.
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤22%) chance of tropical-storm-force winds late Friday into Saturday; sustained gales unlikely.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Freeport coastline.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands could drop 1–3 inches of rain; flooding risk minimal.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents are likely along the upper Texas coast.
